Example - Implementing a New Data Model

This example shows how one can use an existing "data model"-type class and create a new subclass that implements the QicsDataModel API. This new model can be used by QicsTable to display data stored in the original model object.

The code in this example can be found in <QICSDIR>/examples/custom_data_model.

For more information about creating a new data model, see Extending the QicsTable Data Model.

  • custom_data_model.h The new class's header file
  • custom_data_model.cpp The new class's source file
  • main.cpp The main source file
